data.title: Whit by Banks Iain, First Edition
data.meta_description: Whit by Banks, Iain and a great selection of related books, art and collectibles available now at AbeBooks.com.
data.text:
Hardcover. Condition: Very Good. Dust Jacket Condition: Very Good. 1st Edition. A Uk 1st Edition, 1st Printing hardback copy indicated on the copyright page with no further printings mentioned. - The book is in very good condition with a slight push to the top and bottom of the spine and some small bumps to the bottom corners of the boards. Some sunning and light marking to the page block but otherwise tight, square and clean. - The dust jacket is also in very good condition and has not been price clipped with a price of £15.99 shown. Some ruffling to the top and bottom and some light surface scratching, but otherwise very good.

Hardcover. Condition: Very Good. Dust Jacket Condition: Very Good. 1st Edition. First edition first printing. Hardback book is tight clean, and square. Boards sharp and clean, title gilt perfect. Text block has light toning to top edge. Feels gently read. Minor bump to head and foot of spine, Near fine. Jacket some crimping and light creasing to edges. and handling marks to the gloss. Jacket grades very good. For grading accuracy books are photographed without a protective book cover. This book is fitted with a non adhesive archival quality book protector to make a quality addition to your collection. Note we do not use stock images, the book pictured is the book described. Please note : this book is very heavy (1250g) all overseas purchasers may be charged additional shipping. Please contact bookseller for exact price. A solid copy of this collectible first edition first printing title by Banks, that looks very nice on the shelf in the archival fitted cover. To browse the rest of our extensive Iain M Banks listings search using the keyword: Durdbanks.

Hardcover. Condition: Near Fine. Dust Jacket Condition: Very Good. 1st Edition. First edition first printing. Hardback book is tight clean, and square. Boards sharp and clean, title gilt perfect. Text block has partial light sandwich toning to edges. Feels gently read. Minor bump to head and foot of spine, Near fine. Jacket some crimping and light creasing to edges. and handling marks to the gloss. Jacket grades very good. For grading accuracy books are photographed without a protective book cover. This book is fitted with a non adhesive archival quality book protector to make a quality addition to your collection. Note we do not use stock images, the book pictured is the book described. A solid copy of this collectible first edition first printing title by Banks, that looks very nice on the shelf in the archival fitted cover. To browse the rest of our extensive Iain M Banks listings search using the keyword: Durdbanks.

Hardcover. Condition: Fine. Dust Jacket Condition: Fine. 1st Edition. Laid in is a promotional postcard for 'Death Will Have Your Eyes' by James Sallis sent by Rankin in 1998 to a fellow writer, the poet and editor, Hamish White. The hand written message of about 30 words thanks White for a book and that he "enjoyed the library gig. It concludes by inviting White to "come see me 'n' Ellroy 'Live on Stage' at the Edinburgh Bookfest!!' The postcard like the book and jacket is in Fine condition. Signed by Author(s).

Hardcover. Condition: Fine. Dust Jacket Condition: Fine. 1st Edition. A UK 1st Edition 1st Print hardback book indicated on the copyright page with no further printings mentioned. - SIGNED BY THE AUTHOR IN BLUE INK TO THE HALF TITLE PAGE, AND DATED 29.8.95 - The book is in fine condition and feels unread with no inscriptions or tears present. - The dust jacket is also in fine condition and has not been price clipped with a price of £15.99 shown. The dust jacket is now protected in a removable cover. Signed by Author(s).
